feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: I am sure, it is very attentive of them to remember me.

feels.name: Anxiety
feels.quote: I did not like to hear of this 'important meeting,' for, though I did not know much about business, I feared it confirmed what my father said.

causedByEvent.name: Receiving a letter from her father

feels.name: Delight
feels.quote: Miss Matty anticipated the sight of the glossy folds with as much delight as if the five sovereigns, set apart for the purchase, could buy all the silks in the shop.

takePlaceAt.name: Conversation about the new silk gown

feels.name: Perplexity
feels.quote: Miss Matty might have leisure for the delights of perplexity.

takePlaceAt.name: Conversation about the new silk gown
